meta.title: Week 3 – Reported Speech & Passive
meta.description: Backshift, reporting verbs; active/passive forms and uses.

questions.question: Reported speech: Direct = "I am studying now," she said. → She said that ____
answer: she was studying at that time

questions.question: Choose the passive form: "People believe that the painting is priceless."
choices: The painting is believed to be priceless.
It is believed people the painting is priceless.
The painting believes to be priceless.

questions.question: Change to passive: "They will announce the results tomorrow."
answer: The results will be announced tomorrow.
questions.explanation: Future simple passive: will be + past participle.
